text: If a cut or copy is done, the acml files are not included. I can understand this not working if there were only inherited policies. However, the acml isn't cut or copied even if they belonged to the node being cut/copied.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
Hmm, IMO we have to handle that careful.
Imagine the following situation:

  /foo (public)
    /foo1

  /bar (private)

If you now copy /foo1 to bar:

  /bar
    /foo1

This way, you create a public area in a private branch.
But I guess you're right and the sitemanger just has to know what she does.
creator: andreas@apache.org
